spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is preserved including the central hall and bay window. However, several door swings and wall segments in the utility/WC area are misaligned compared to the technical drawing.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent adherence to structural constraints. Model is floating on a neutral background, roof is removed, and all labels/measurements have been stripped successfully.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen cabinetry and bathroom fixtures are well-placed, though the 'dining room' remains empty and the staircase detail is slightly simplified.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High adherence to the low-poly, flat-shaded style. Deducted points for lighting being slightly more directional/dramatic than a true 'flat ambient' requirement.

detected_errors.description: Door swing directions and specific small wall partitions in the utility and WC area do not match the precise blueprint orientation.
Visible shadows indicate a directional light source rather than the requested flat ambient shading.
The breakfast deck/exterior transition indicated on the far right of the plan is omitted in the 3D extrusion.
